availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Joseph and Nancy O'Daniel. Married to Sarah O'Daniel on September 16, 1856. Married to Nannie O'Daniel. Father of Lucy O'Daniel, William O'Daniel, Jeff O'Daniel, and Victor O'Daniel. Farmer in Marion County in 1850. Farmer in Washington County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District no. 1, p. 340-41. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, District no. 2, p. 3. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Lebanon, p. 71-72. Kentucky, County Marriages, 1783-1965, Nelson County 1834-1857, Film #000499977.
